verses.verse: And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and <S%H6318>Potiphar<s%>, an <S%H5631>officer<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%>, an <S%H376>Egyptian<s%>, <S%H7069>bought<s%> him of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H3459>Ishmeelites<s%>, which had brought him down <S%H3381>there<s%>
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and he was a <S%H6743>prosperous<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>; and he was in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H113>master<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>.
And his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with <S%H3068>him<s%>, and that the Lord made all that he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%>, and he <S%H8334>served<s%> <S%H6485>him<s%>: and he made him overseer over his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and all that he <S%H3426>had<s%> he <S%H5414>put<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And it came to pass from the <S%H227>time<s%> that he had made him <S%H6485>overseer<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and over all that he <S%H3426>had<s%>, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1558>sake<s%>; and the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was upon all that he <S%H3426>had<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and in the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

And he <S%H5800>left<s%> all that he had in <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and he <S%H3045>knew<s%> not <S%H3972>what<s%> he <S%H518>had<s%>, save the <S%H3899>bread<s%> which he did <S%H398>eat<s%>. And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was a <S%H8389>goodly<s%> <S%H3303>person<s%>, and well <S%H4758>favored<s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, that his <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5375>cast<s%> her <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>; and she <S%H559>said<s%>, Lie with <S%H7901>me<s%>.

But he <S%H3985>refused<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H113>Behold<s%>, my master <S%H3045>knows<s%> not what is with me in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and he has <S%H5414>committed<s%> all that he <S%H3426>has<s%> to my <S%H3027>hand<s%>;

There is none <S%H1419>greater<s%> in this <S%H1004>house<s%> than <S%H3808>I<s%>; neither has he kept <S%H2820>back<s%> any <S%H3972>thing<s%> from me but you <S%H834>because<s%> <S%H859>you<s%> are his <S%H802>wife<s%>: how then can I <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, and <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H430>God<s%>?

And it came to <S%H1696>pass<s%>, as she spoke to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%>, that he <S%H8085>listened<s%> not unto <S%H7901>her<s%>, to lie by <S%H681>her<s%>, or to be with her.

And it came to pass about this <S%H3117>time<s%>, that Joseph <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H4399>business<s%>; and there was none of the <S%H376>men<s%> of the house there <S%H1004>inside<s%>

And she <S%H8610>caught<s%> him by his <S%H899>garment<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7901>Lie<s%> with <S%H5800>me<s%>: and he left his <S%H899>garment<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and <S%H3318>got<s%> him <S%H2351>out<s%>.
And it came to <S%H7200>pass<s%>, when she saw that he had <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and was <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H2351>forth<s%>,

That she <S%H7121>called<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of her <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, <S%H7200>See<s%>, he has brought <S%H935>in<s%> an <S%H376>Hebrew<s%> unto us to <S%H6711>mock<s%> <S%H935>us<s%>; he came in unto me to <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H7121>me<s%>, and I cried with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>:

And it came to <S%H8085>pass<s%>, when he heard that I lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%>, that he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> with <S%H681>me<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and got <S%H3318>him<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%>.
And she laid <S%H3240>up<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> by <S%H681>her<s%>, until his <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%>.

And she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto him according to these <S%H1697>words<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%>, which you have <S%H935>brought<s%> unto <S%H935>us<s%>, came in unto me to mock <S%H6711>me<s%>:

And it came to <S%H7311>pass<s%>, as I lifted up my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%>, that he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> with <S%H681>me<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%>.

And it came to <S%H113>pass<s%>, when his master <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H802>wife<s%>, which she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, After this <S%H1697>manner<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> to <S%H639>me<s%>; that his anger was <S%H2734>kindled<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5414>him<s%>, and put him into the <S%H1004>prison<s%>, a <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H615>prisoners<s%> were <S%H631>bound<s%>: and he was there in the <S%H1004>prison<s%>.

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H5186>shown<s%> him <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004>prison<s%>.

And the <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H5414>committed<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> all the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> that were in the <S%H1004>prison<s%>; and whatever they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H6213>there<s%>, he was the doer of it.

The <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> not to any <S%H3972>thing<s%> that was under his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with <S%H6213>him<s%>, and that which he did, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made it to <S%H6743>prosper<s%>.
